# Spirit Ally (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]]) \[see text]

**Level:** [[Celestial (Domain)|Celestial 6]], [[6th Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Up to 16 HD worth of spirits, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart when they appear

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 114

As *[[Spirit Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser spirit ally]]*, except you may call a single spirit of up to 16 HD or a number of spirits of the same type whose HD total no more than 16. The spirits, as a group, agree to perform one task for you and request one favor in return.
